value.string: Backstop PI - Tech Error: Bot unable to identify Prod/Non Prod env

value.expression:
Hello, 

Technical Error: Bot unable to identify Prod/Non Prod env

The Backstop PI bot was not completed successfully as the AA CR URL did not match with the configured values.

Please contact the RPA support group - RPASupport@sbafla.com for resolutions.

Automation Anywhere Control Room URL: $System:AAControlRoom$

Date and time: $m-date-string$
Username: $m-string-1$
